# Sources

Here's a selection of links cited in the course material. The list is not yet complete, so this page does not show up in the course listings.

```{r links, echo = FALSE, results='asis'}
x = lapply(1:12, FUN = function(x) {
  l = ida.links(x)
  # links with titles and bracket author
  l = gsub("(\\[[a-z-]+\\]): http(.*) \"(.*)\\((.*)\\)\"", "[\\3](http\\2) (\\4)", l)
  # links with titles 
  l = gsub("(\\[[a-z-]+\\]): http(.*) \"(.*)\"", "[\\3](http\\2)", l)
  # links without titles
  l = l[-which(grepl("(\\[[a-z-]+\\]): http(.*)", l))] ## "\\1(http\\2)"
  # print
  if(length(l) > 0) {
    cat("\n\n## Session ", x, "\n")
    cat(paste("*", l), sep = "\n")
    }
  })
```
